name: Ref. Case Res. ASHP (FS)

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Current minimum efficiency air source heat pump performance in 2030; conversion from original standard: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see second EIA source); split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Draft PDS-01, MINHERS Addendum 71, SEER2/HSPF2 Conversions
Residential Demand Module of the National Energy Modeling System: Model Documentation 2014

installed_cost_source.notes: Installed costs for minimum standard split-system ASHP; added service costs of $1K for natural gas and $2K for distillate/other assigned based on EIA report, and added costs of $6300 as the average of the cost range for circuit breaker panel upgrade and home service upgrade costs in NV5 report.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Residential End Uses: Area 2: Incremental Installed Costs for Efficiency Upgrades
Service Upgrades for Electrification Retrofits Study Final Report
source_data.author: Shoshana Pena, Collin Smith, Greg Butsko, Rick Gardner, Sean Armstrong, Emily Higbee, Dylan Anderson, Rebecca Hueckel

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetime of minimum standard ASHP in 2023, rounded down from 15.3 years

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

cooling.title: RECS 2020 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 59.5% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling (main air conditioning equipment type = central AC = 1) in the sample is 12,211 homes, and then filtered for homes with non-electric heating system (Main space heating fuel != electricity = 5) 12,211-3,949 homes.

_description: Standard size residential air source heat pump with reference case performance (counterfactual), non-cold-climate
